Note - Class in notification
Notes are (usually) instantly broadcasted to all registered NotificationListeners and contain live data from the Sensor network.

Generate a new message auto-broadcasted Note with the type INFORMATION
Note(String, int) - Constructor for class notification.Note

Generate a new message auto-broadcasted Note.
Note(int, String, boolean) - Constructor for class notification.Note
Generate a new message auto-broadcasted Note.
note(Note) - Method in interface notification.NotificationListener
This method is called whenever a new note is broadcasted.
NoteConstants - Interface in notification
Constant list for the Note class.
notification - package notification
 
NotificationListener - Interface in notification
Objects that should receive live data from the Sensor network.
